item.title: Philip Rivers could join exclusive list of athletes to suit up while being a grandparent
item.description: If the 44-year-old plays this season, he won't be the first grandparent to suit up.

item.title: Brady Cook to start? Jets could do something at QB they haven't done in 50 years
item.description: If Tyrod Taylor and Justin Fields can't go, New York will start its first undrafted rookie since 1975.

item.title: Steelers' Watt at hospital having lung evaluated
item.description: Steelers star pass rusher T.J. Watt is in a local hospital for further lung evaluation after "experiencing discomfort" at the practice facility Wednes...

item.title: Moore expected in court Fri., remains in custody
item.description: Fired Michigan football coach Sherrone Moore, who remains in custody as a suspect in an alleged assault, is expected to appear in court for arraignmen...

item.title: Former Padres closer Suarez signs with Braves
item.description: Former Padres closer Robert Suarez has signed a three-year, $45 million contract with the Atlanta Braves, the team announced Thursday..
